item.title: [508] Ip ban -Not Working On Any Other 508 Sources- [508]
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

Iâ€™m useing this code for my 508 Ipban.

[code] if (command.startsWith(ipban)
&& (playerRights = 2 playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Account) playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Master A I D) playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Kaleb) playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(Account))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage(player successfully ip banned);
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                +  HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER  + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;
        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter(bannedhosts, true));
            bw.write(playerName +  banned + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage(Error logging ip bans!);
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

I Tired, Every Single Code, Out There, & What, i get, nothing.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 08:42:08 am[/size][hr]

Read full topic
